title: PROUDLY SERVING
description: Essence of Spiritual Balance - Essence of Spiritual Balance Offers Acupuncture Therapy in Byron, IL 61010
cleaned_text: WELCOME TO ESSENCE OF SPIRITUAL BALANCE [Essence of Spiritual Balance](/contact) is a clinic that offers [acupuncture](/acupuncture) and therapeutic massages in [Byron, IL](https://goo.gl/maps/vHHYXgSfraivCTUL9). Our clinic offers massage therapy, acupuncture, and nutrition counseling to relax and guide the body toward a healthy path. Our spa strives to satisfy and relax our clients, relieving their stress and rejuvenating their bodies. All our skilled acupuncture massage therapists are friendly and experienced professionals. Essence of Spiritual Balance offers the your central nervous system to spark an [electrical stimulation](/acupuncture), releasing the tension from your muscles, spinal cord, and brain. Our services confer the benefits of detoxification, improved circulation, and reduced inflammation through natural means. We accommodate appointments from Monday to Saturday. Treat yourself to a massage in the comfort of your home today, and contact us at Essence of Spiritual Balance today to schedule your appointment.
